item.description: Join us on Sunday, October 9, from 10:30 a.m. until 12:00 noon. for a walk on a walking/jogging trail in Woodbridge followed by optional lunch. Fitzgerald Trails is located at 100 Center Road in Woodbridge, Connecticut, and there’s plenty of parking at the Woodbridge Town Library at 10 Newton Road. We will meet on the trail next to the intersection of Center Rd (Route 114) and Beecher Rd. If you arrive after 10:30 a.m., just wait at this location and you will see us in a few minutes as we walk around the track or you can call one of the mobile numbers below. The event will be canceled in the event of rain. If in doubt about the weather, contact Manny Ratafia: e-mail: manny@ratafias.com, hm 203-387-7348, mobile 203-901-9553 or Nina Stein  hm 203-757-2539, mobile 203-215-0022 or Marsha Zellner hm 203-393-2816, mobile 203-494-3856.
item.how_to_find_us: on the trail next to the intersection of Center Rd (Route 114) and Beecher Rd
item.name: Woodbridge Walk
